segments.text: Wow ! What a beautiful scenic spot ! It's so open . And just breathe that fresh air , you can almost taste its freshness .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can have a bird view of Guiling City from the top of the mountain .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wonderful ! I'll often come here for mountain climbing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You should . Many Guiliners , especially the old and the young , will climb mountains here in the morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Quick ! Pass me your binoculars . Look at that bird ... I've never seen one of those before . It's indigenous to Guiling , and an endangered species too . This is lucky !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I didn't know you liked bird-watching .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't really . I just like wildlife , and you don't get to see too much of it in the city . This place is full of it .
segments.speaker: S2
